title: 10 luxury highlights from this year's London Design Festival
text:
The London Design Festival swung into action over the weekend, with installations, activations and design showcases taking place all over the city, and a wealth of new product launches. Here’s our round-up of the pick of the luxury-design highlights.

Bill Amberg printed leathers, Stable Street, Coal Drops Yard, N1 (from 19th September)

Leather specialist Bill Amberg unveils a new collection of digitally printed hides, created in collaboration with six design stars: Marcel Wanders, Champalimaud, Calico Wallpaper, Solange Azagury-Partridge, Lisa Miller and Matthew Day Jackson. The results, which can be used for upholstery and walling, are typically inventive, ranging from rainbow brights from Azagury-Partridge (pictured) to Jackson’s, inspired by the surface of the moon.
